roleset.name: to assume, suppose in advance.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Well , to my understanding , intelligent design presupposes that everything in life is too complex , that it has to be designed .
example.arg: everything in life is too complex , that it has to be designed .

roleset.note: PRESUPPOSE-V NOTES: Roleset based on usages in ULA-MASC1-rest. No VN class. Framed by Claire. (from presuppose.01-v)
